name: Docs!
description: An online live collaborative document editor that enables multiple users to edit, comment, and collaborate on documents in real-time, enhancing teamwork and productivity

name: Chat App
description: A real-time chat application for friends and family to stay connected

name: Sticky Notes
description: A simple and intuitive sticky notes website that allows users to create, organize, and manage virtual notes for quick reminders and task tracking.

name: Storage Management System
description: A storage management system designed to efficiently organize, track, and manage inventory, ensuring optimal use of storage space and real-time updates
